00045 /**************************************************************************/
00056 Ecode_t ezradioStartDirectTransmit(EZRADIODRV_Handle_t radioHandle )
00057 {
00058   ezradio_cmd_reply_t ezradioReply;
00059 
00060   if ( radioHandle == NULL )
00061   {
00062     return ECODE_EMDRV_EZRADIODRV_ILLEGAL_HANDLE;
00063   }
00064 
00065   /* Request and check radio device state */
00066   ezradio_request_device_state(&ezradioReply);
00067 
00068   if (ezradioReply.REQUEST_DEVICE_STATE.CURR_STATE == EZRADIO_CMD_REQUEST_DEVICE_STATE_REP_CURR_STATE_MAIN_STATE_ENUM_TX) {
00069     return ECODE_EMDRV_EZRADIODRV_TRANSMIT_FAILED;
00070   }
00071 
00072   /* Read ITs, clear pending ones */
00073   ezradio_get_int_status(0u, 0u, 0u, NULL);
00074 
00075   /* Start sending packet, channel 0, START immediately, Packet n bytes long, go READY when done */
00076   ezradio_start_tx(radioHandle->directTx.channel, 0u,  0u);
00077 
00078   return ECODE_EMDRV_EZRADIODRV_OK;
00079 }
00080 
00081 /**************************************************************************/
00088 Ecode_t ezradioStopDirectTransmit( void )
00089 {
00090   ezradio_change_state(EZRADIO_CMD_CHANGE_STATE_ARG_NEXT_STATE1_NEW_STATE_ENUM_READY);
00091 
00092   return ECODE_EMDRV_EZRADIODRV_OK;
00093 }
